segments.text: Annie , what is troubling you ? You look unhappy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A man is pursuing me . He was my schoolmate in college , and he has been carrying a torch for me for three years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know that I have had a series of miserable relationships . Last summer , I fell in love with John . But the romance blossomed for six or seven weeks , and then wilted .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One love drives out another . You shouldn't be afraid to start a new relationship .
segments.speaker: S1
